thought: The error is caused because the action_1 function is defined to take only one argument (input_data), but in the mainWorkflow it is called with two arguments (input_data and params). The same applies to action_2. I need to modify the action_1 and action_2 functions to accept params as an optional argument and pass them correctly to the transparent_action run method. Also, I will update mainWorkflow to call these actions with two arguments accordingly.
plan: Modify action_1 to accept optional params argument and pass it to function.run()
Modify action_2 to accept optional params argument and pass it to function.run()
Update mainWorkflow to call action_1 and action_2 with input_data and params
Test the workflow to confirm no TypeError and correct execution
criticism: Currently, the action functions only accept one argument, but the workflow calls them with two, causing TypeError. This mismatch must be fixed to enable passing params dynamically.
